content.heading: <datalist> Tag
paragraphs: The <datalist> tag provides pre-defined options for an <input> element.

Example: <label for="browser">Choose your browser:</label><input list="browsers" name="browser" id="browser"><datalist id="browsers"><option value="Edge"><option value="Firefox"><option value="Chrome"></datalist>

content.heading: Definition and Usage
paragraphs: Enables autocomplete with a drop-down list.
The <datalist> id must match the <input> list attribute.

content.heading: Browser Support
paragraphs: Supported by Chrome 20.0, Edge 10.0, Firefox 4.0, Safari 12.1, Opera 9.5.
